divs: Sighting DetailsWitnessed a black disc hovering in the clear, blue sky while driving home. After arriving home, wife and sister-in-law also reported seeing same black disc, but the saw it move at high speed, make right angle turns, and stop on a dime. Went outside to look for it again but it was gone. Location: New Design Road, Frederick, MD 21703 This not the first time i have seen objects similar to this one in this exact same area, but it was the first time during daylight hours.
trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Frederick
There were no other sightings in Frederick on or around August 31st 2008
